Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: Phexton watch tower is on the east side, and another road is close by.
Room.LongDescription: The small village of Phexton is further north, and Phexton Bridge is south. Long ago, before modern signaling methods, there were a series of watch towers built throughout the mountains whose purpose was to watch for trolls and other invaders and warn the cities. They used to light giant bonfires on top of the towers to signal one another. They are no longer used for that purpose, and stand empty these days.
